### UserInfo on a string

```jsx
<UserInfo
  user={{
    profile: {
      displayName: 'Rick Sanchez',
      username: 'picklerick',
      walletAddress: '0x1afb213afa8729fa7908154b90e256f1be70989a'
    }
  }}
>
  <span>If you hover here, you get info about a user</span>
</UserInfo>
```

### UserInfo on an user's avatar

```jsx
import UserAvatar from '../UserAvatar';

const avatar = 'data:image/svg+xml;base64,';

<UserInfo
  user={{
    profile: {
      displayName: 'Chewbacca',
      username: 'chewie',
      walletAddress: '0x1afb213afa8729fa7908154b90e256f1be70987a'
    }
  }}
>
  <UserAvatar
    address="0x1afb213afa8729fa7908154b90e256f1be70987a"
    avatarURL={avatar}
  />
</UserInfo>
```

### UserInfo with an incorrect address provided

```jsx
<UserInfo
  user={{
    profile: {
      displayName: 'Morty Smith',
      username: 'no_address_morty',
      walletAddress: '0x0'
    }
  }}
>
  <span>Arggg! This address is wrong!</span>
</UserInfo>
```
